text: Severodvinsk () is a city in Arkhangelsk Oblast, Russia. In 2010, 192,353 people lived there. == Twin towns == Severodvinsk is twinned with: * Portsmouth, New Hampshire, United States * Bryansk, Russia * Mazyr, Belarus * Sumy, Ukraine * Tiraspol, Moldova Category:Cities and towns in Arkhangelsk Oblast
title: Severodvinsk
